titleStmt.title: A newe dialog betwene thangell of God, & the shepherdes in the felde concernynge the natiuite and birthe of Jesus Christ our Lorde & Sauyoure : no lesse godlye than swete and pleasante to reade / lately compyled by T.B.
titleStmt.author: Becon, Thomas, 1512-1567.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by me John Daye dwellyng in Sepulchres paryshe a lytle aboue Holbourne conduit,

notesStmt.note: Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
